title: Pan-fried Chicken with Mushrooms and Blueberries
ingredients: ['1 tbsp plain flour', '4 skinless chicken breast fillets, about 125g each', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 thick unsmoked, rindless back bacon rashers, cut into strips', '250g chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', '200g blueberries', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '3 tbsp finely chopped fresh parsley', 'lemon wedges to garnish (optional)']
